item.title: 古巴首都恢复正常，全国停电后的恢复工作向前推进
item.description: 古巴能源和矿业部周四表示，首都哈瓦那 80% 的地区已经通电，全国大部分能源网在电网崩溃 24 小时后已经恢复供电，970 万居民仍处于黑暗之中。【原文：The Cuban Energy and Mining Ministry said on Thursday 80% of the capital, Havana, had power and most of the country's energy grid had been reestablished 24 hours after it crashed, leaving 9.7 million residents in the dark.】

item.title: 现代汽车首席执行官表示：突击检查后，现代电池工厂至少要推迟 2-3 个月才能投产
item.description: 现代汽车公司首席执行官何塞-穆诺兹（Jose Munoz）周四表示，现代汽车公司共同拥有的一家电池厂在上周遭到移民突袭后，将面临至少两到三个月的延期。【原文：A battery plant co-owned by Hyundai Motor is facing a minimum delay of two to three months following an immigration raid last week, Hyundai's CEO Jose Munoz said Thursday.】

item.title: The Information 报道：阿里巴巴和百度开始使用自有芯片训练人工智能模型
item.description: The Information 周四援引四位直接知情人士的话报道称，中国的阿里巴巴和百度已开始使用内部设计的芯片来训练其人工智能模型，部分取代了英伟达（Nvidia）生产的芯片。【原文：China's Alibaba and Baidu have started using internally designed chips to train their AI models, partly replacing those made by Nvidia , The Information reported on Thursday, citing four people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 埃里森逼近马斯克成为世界首富
item.description: 甲骨文公司股价大涨，使联合创始人拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）更接近世界富豪榜榜首。【原文：Oracle's share surge propels co-founder Larry Ellison closer to the top of the world's richest list.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲央行行长将 12 月视为下一次减息的机会
item.description: 三位消息人士告诉路透社，欧洲央行决策者认为，12月的会议是讨论是否需要再次降息以缓冲欧元区经济受美国关税影响的最现实的时间框架。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers see their December meeting as the most realistic time frame to debate whether an another interest rate cut is needed to buffer the euro zone economy from the impact of U.S. tariffs, three sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会对人工智能聊天机器人展开调查
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周四表示，它正在向包括 Alphabet、Meta 和 OpenAI 在内的七家提供面向消费者的人工智能聊天机器人的公司寻求信息，以了解这些公司如何衡量、测试和监控潜在的负面影响。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Thursday said it is seeking information from seven companies including Alphabet , Meta and OpenAI that provide consumer-facing AI-powered chatbots, on how these firms measure, test, and monitor potentially negative impacts.】

item.title: Stellantis 希望通过重新推出 RAM 卡车和吉普切诺基来增加收入
item.description: 新任首席执行官安东尼奥-菲洛萨（Antonio Filosa）周四在开始勾勒斯堪尼亚汽车公司的新业务计划时表示，通过新车型增加收入将是斯堪尼亚未来战略的重要支柱，也是恢复现金流的途径。【原文：Increasing revenues thanks to new models will be a key pillar of Stellantis' future strategy and a way to restore cash generation, new CEO Antonio Filosa said on Thursday as he started to sketch out the automaker's new business plan.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统表示，墨西哥不希望因关税措施引发冲突
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆周四表示，墨西哥政府并不希望与包括中国在内的计划提高关税的国家发生冲突。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum on Thursday said her government was not looking for a conflict with countries on which it plans to increase tariffs, including China.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称美国经济出现紧张；需求放缓，就业增长放缓
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周四表示，美国经济在经历了多年的恢复性增长后正显现出一些压力，国内需求放缓，就业增长放缓。【原文：The U.S. economy is showing some strains after years of resilience, with domestic demand moderating and job growth slowing, the International Monetary Fund said on Thursday.】

item.title: 大众汽车西雅特/Cupra 临时首席执行官：我们有信心很快取得积极成果
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，法国阿特米斯公司不会以当前价值退出彪马股份
item.description: 一位接近该公司的消息人士周四告诉路透社，皮纳尔家族控股的、控制着古驰（Gucci）所有者开云集团（Kering）的阿尔忒弥斯公司（Artemis）不会以当前市值出售其持有的运动品牌彪马（Puma）29%的股份，也没有参与交易谈判。【原文：Artemis, the Pinault family's holding that controls Gucci-owner Kering, will not sell its 29% stake in sports brand Puma at the current market value and is not engaged in talks over a deal, a source close to the firm told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国商务部长卢特尼克在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，美国将解决与印度的贸易问题
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周四表示，他相信一旦印度停止购买俄罗斯石油，美国将尽快与印度达成贸易协议。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Thursday he believes the United States will sort out a trade deal with India as soon as that country stops buying Russian oil.】

item.title: 中国恒大清算人寻求出售物业服务部门股权
item.description: 中国恒大集团的清算人已经收到了希望接手该开发商旗下物业服务部门股权的相关方的联系。【原文：Liquidators of China Evergrande Group have received approaches from parties looking to take over the developer's stake in its property services unit.】

item.title: 阿尔巴尼亚任命人工智能机器人为反腐部长
item.description: 阿尔巴尼亚负责公共采购的新部长将不会受到贿赂、威胁或讨好的企图的影响。这是因为她的名字叫 Diella，是一个人工智能生成的机器人。【原文：A new minister in Albania charged to handle public procurement will be impervious to bribes, threats, or attempts to curry favour. That is because Diella, as she is called, is an AI-generated bot.】

item.title: Capital One 因两家银行倒闭而多收费用起诉 FDIC
item.description: Capital One 起诉联邦存款保险公司，指控该美国监管机构在硅谷银行（Silicon Valley Bank）和签名银行（Signature Bank）于 2023 年倒闭后，为弥补其存款保险基金的损失，征收了 4.741 亿美元的超额特别摊款。【原文：Capital One sued the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, accusing the U.S. regulator of imposing an excessive $474.1 million special assessment to recoup losses to its deposit insurance fund following the collapses of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank in 2023.】

item.title: 欧盟在与美国能源部长会谈后坚持 2028 年退出俄罗斯天然气市场
item.description: 欧盟能源专员丹-约根森（Dan Jorgensen）周四在与美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）会晤后表示，欧盟将坚持在2028年前逐步停止进口俄罗斯石油和天然气的最后期限。【原文：The EU is sticking to its deadline to phase out Russian oil and gas imports by 2028, EU Energy Commissioner Dan Jorgensen said on Thursday after a meeting with U.S. Energy Secretary Chris Wright.】

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会看来将恢复降息，而同行的降息行动已接近尾声
item.description: 在发达市场的中央银行中，美国联邦储备委员会（美联储）是一个异类，因为就在许多同行的宽松周期即将结束之际，美联储似乎准备恢复降息。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is an outlier among central banks in developed markets, as it looks set to resume rate cuts just as many of its peers are reaching the end of their easing cycles.】

item.title: 就业忧虑盖过通胀担忧，美联储有望降息
item.description: 对就业市场疲软的担忧将使美联储继续在下周恢复降息，不过由于有新的迹象表明关税正在推高物价，美国央行可能会谨慎行事。【原文：Concern about a softening job market will keep the Federal Reserve on course to resume its interest rate cuts next week, though the U.S. central bank is likely to move cautiously because of fresh signs that tariffs are pushing prices higher.】

item.title: 诺和诺德在首席执行官的复兴努力中通知员工全职返回办公室
item.description: 肥胖症药物市场竞争激烈，新任首席执行官试图加快决策速度并提高商业执行力。【原文：Wegovy-maker Novo Nordisk said on Thursday it had told all its staff to return to the office as the drugmaker's new CEO tries to accelerate decision-making and improve its commercial execution amid intense competition in the obesity drug market.】

item.title: 达美航空公司重申年度盈利预期，原因是旅行需求持续增长
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周四重申了全年和当前季度的盈利预期，并押注于美国旅行需求的持续增长。【原文：Delta Air Lines on Thursday reaffirmed its full-year and current-quarter earnings forecasts, betting on sustained travel demand in the U.S.】

item.title: 拉加德在欧洲央行新闻发布会上发表评论
item.description: 法兰克福，9月11日（路透社）--欧洲中央银行周四一如预期维持利率不变，但未就下一步行动提供任何线索，即使投资者继续押注明年通胀率降至目标以下时将需要更多支持。【原文：FRANKFURT, Sept 11 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank left interest rates unchanged on Thursday as expected but offered no clues about its next move, even as investors continue to bet that more support will be needed as inflation dips below target next year.】

item.title: GE Vernova 将以 6 亿美元的价格向 TPG 出售 Proficy 部门
item.description: 美国电力设备制造商 GE Vernova 周四表示，作为削减成本措施的一部分，该公司已同意将其工业软件业务 Proficy 以 6 亿美元的价格出售给资产管理公司 TPG。【原文：U.S. power equipment maker GE Vernova said on Thursday it had agreed to sell Proficy, its industrial software business, to asset management firm TPG for $600 million as part of cost-cutting measures.】

item.title: VIEW 美国消费者物价涨幅超预期，但仍将降息
item.description: 尽管在劳动力市场疲软的情况下，这些数字并不能阻止美联储下周降息。【原文：U.S. consumer prices rose more than expected in August while the annual increase in inflation was the largest in seven months, although the numbers will not prevent an interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve next week in the midst of a weakening labor market.】

item.title: 美元兑日元缩减涨幅，欧元在通胀数据和申请失业救济人数公布后转为走高
item.description: 美元兑日元逆转了涨势，而欧元则在周四转而走高，此前通胀数据基本符合市场预测，从而强化了美联储将在下周政策会议上恢复降息的观点。【原文：The U.S. dollar reversed gains against the yen while the euro turned higher on Thursday after inflation data came in mostly in-line with market forecasts, reinforcing the view that the Federal Reserve will resume cutting interest rates at a policy meeting next week.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数增加，劳动力市场疲软
item.description: 上周，新申请失业救济金的美国人数量大幅增加，这与劳动力市场状况出现实质性疲软是一致的。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits increased sharply last week, consistent with a material softening in labor market conditions.】

item.title: 美联储 9 月降息已成定局，年底前至少会再降息一次
item.description: 市场已经对 9 月份的减产做出了充分定价，现在预计今年将有三次减产，而几周前只有两次。【原文：Markets have fully priced in a September cut and now anticipate three reductions this year, compared to two just weeks ago.】

item.title: 克罗格上调年度销售预期，因杂货需求保持强劲
item.description: 周四，美国杂货商克罗格公司（Kroger）上调了其年度核心销售额预期，在人们越来越担心与关税相关的消费需求压力的情况下，该公司寄希望于其低价产品的弹性需求。【原文：U.S. grocer Kroger raised its annual core sales forecast on Thursday, banking on resilient demand for its lower-priced products amid growing concerns over tariff-related pressure on consumer demand.】

item.title: 欧佩克坚持石油需求预测，称经济运行良好
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）周四没有改变其对今明两年全球石油需求相对较高的增长预测，并表示今年下半年世界经济将保持稳健增长趋势。【原文：OPEC made no changes on Thursday to its relatively high global oil demand growth forecasts for this year and next, and said the world economy was maintaining a solid growth trend in the second half of this year.】

item.title: 美国内政部长称美国希望加强与希腊的能源联系
item.description: 美国内政部长道格-伯格姆（Doug Burgum）周四访问雅典时表示，美国希望扩大与希腊的能源联系，因为特朗普政府正致力于进一步减少俄罗斯对欧洲的石油和天然气供应。【原文：The United States wants to expand its energy ties with Greece, U.S. Interior Secretary Doug Burgum said during a visit to Athens on Thursday, as the Trump administration works to further reduce Russia's oil and gas supplies to Europe.】

item.title: M&S 数字主管在遭受黑客攻击数月后离职
item.description: 英国零售商玛莎百货公司周四表示，该公司的首席数字和技术官将在网络攻击导致其在线业务瘫痪数月后卸任。【原文：Marks & Spencer's chief digital and technology officer is stepping down from her role, months after a cyberattack crippled its online operations, the British retailer said on Thursday.】
